original_title: ミニスカニーソから覗く「絶対領域」に興奮が抑えられなくなってしまった僕は…
overview: The absolute area between cute girls' bottoms and knee-high socks! I was shown that area in casual everyday life, my eyes met, and I couldn't control my reasoning, so I decided to step further into that area...
title: I Can’t Control My Excitement In The “absolute Area” That I Can See From The Mini Skirt …
